/* 검색 시 행 수 */ SELECT COUNT(tb.transfer_board_no) FROM transfer_board tb INNER JOIN sell_products sp USING (sell_products_no) INNER JOIN products p USING (products_no)
p.products_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%');
/* 전체 행 수 */ SELECT COUNT(tb.transfer_board_no) FROM transfer_board tb INNER JOIN sell_products sp USING (sell_products_no) INNER JOIN products p USING (products_no);

/* 양도 게시글 정보 조회 */ SELECT tb.transfer_title, tb.transfer_rental_processing_status, dl.delivery_addr, tb.cust_id, p.products_nm , tb.board_valid_date, tb.remaining_months , tb.rental_fee, tb.individual_grants, tb.transfer_content FROM products p RIGHT JOIN sell_products sp USING (products_no) INNER JOIN delivery_information di USING (sell_products_no) INNER JOIN delivery_list dl USING (delivery_location_no) INNER JOIN transfer_board tb USING (del_info_no) WHERE tb.transfer_board_no = #{transferBoardNum};

/* 양도 게시글 목록 조회 (제목, 작성자, 상품명, 이미지)*/ SELECT tb.transfer_board_no , p.products_image , tb.cust_id , c.cust_nm , pc.middle_category , pc.small_category , tb.transfer_title , tb.rental_fee , tb.individual_grants , tb.transfer_rental_processing_status , tb.register_date FROM customer c RIGHT JOIN transfer_board tb USING (cust_id) INNER JOIN sell_products sp USING (sell_products_no) INNER JOIN products p USING (products_no) INNER JOIN products_category pc ON p.product_category_no = pc.product_category_no ORDER BY tb.register_date DESC LIMIT 16 OFFSET #{offset};
